import React, { useState } from 'react'; const OfflineMode = ({ onBack }) => { const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('main'); // 'main' or 'scrollable' const renderMainView = () => (

); const renderScrollableView = () => (

); return (

); }; export default OfflineMode;
